data.text: Sometimes the hardest part isn't letting go, but rather, learning to start over.
Opportunities are not offered. They must be wrested and worked for. And this calls for perseverance and courage.
There's no point having wishes if you don't at least try to do them.
Remember, happiness doesn't depend upon who you are or what you have; it depends solely upon what you think.
Sometimes things have to fall apart to make way for better things.
It's not about making the amazing saves. It's the little things and small things that made great gatekeepers great.
The turning point in the process of growing up is when you discover the core of strength within you that survives all hurt.
